com.io7m.r2.core

Interface R2SceneLightsGroupConsumerType


  • public interface R2SceneLightsGroupConsumerType
    A consumer for lights within a specific group.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFinish()
      Called when rendering of the group is finished.

      void      		 onLightSingleShaderFinish(R2ShaderLightSingleUsableType<M> s)
      Called when the current shader should be deactivated.
      <M extends R2LightSingleReadableType>
      void      		 onLightSingleShaderStart(R2ShaderLightSingleUsableType<M> s)
      Called when a new shader should be activated in order to start rendering single lights.

      Called when rendering of the light group begins.
